ygData.subject: An honest view by a high level wizard
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Brothers and Sisters, After reading all the petitions, suggestions and well thought improvements to our classes I got but one thing to say, dream on :)
ygData.messageBody:
Dear Brothers and Sisters,

After reading all the petitions, suggestions and well thought improvements to our classes I got but one thing to say, dream on :)

Verant thinks we are overpowered, and quite frankly at higher levels we are devastating.

I'm currently level 31 and *I* can solo very well, so do NOT lose that will, we DO get better and the level is called TWENTY NINE (29).

Would like to coment on a few things.

1) Groups, we can't hit red. After level 29 or so you wont get close to reds, not even in a full party. :) So, its only a low mid level thing.

2) Root/Enstill. Remember when you got root at level 4 and it was horrible ? Remember how it got better at level 8 ? Same thing with Enstill, at 26+ it gets MUCH better. Sure, you would recast in battle, but it works great.

3) SoW, Speed Spells. At level 24 or so you don't need this, you can teleport pretty much everywhere except planes. If you need to run, just keep rooting and flee or just buy yourself SoW for a plat or so, dont ask, OFFER the plat.

4) Petitions to Verant, utility spells ? Perhaps, anything that will make us better in combat, forget it. We are already devastating.

5) And Most Important. Level 20-23 SUCKS !!!

I can ALMOST solo yellow Giants, HANG IN THERE !

Good luck my friends.
